section.name: Introduction
section.summary:
Welcome to the Introduction of the course Teaching Adult English Learners: Principles and Practices. The brief introductory video outlines the course and reviews the learning objectives as a way of previewing what you will be learning.

To get started do the following:

  • View the Introduction Video
  • Complete the pre-course assessment
  • Complete the Pause and Think Handout

After you complete the activities in this section, return to the main course page to begin Unit 1, where we will address understanding adult English learners.
